snippet: The chef Robert Irvine works his magic on ailing dining spots for “Restaurant: Impossible,” but not all of his improvements stick.
abstract: Chef Robert Irvine works his magic on ailing dining spots for Restaurant: Impossible, Food Network show, but not all of his improvements stick; most owners, even the ones who have undone Irvine’s dictates, have no regrets; say they got to watch a pro up close, got a motivating kick in the pants and, through the magic of television, got their restaurant transformed to celebrity status.
lead_paragraph: The chef Robert Irvine works his magic on ailing dining spots for “Restaurant: Impossible,” but not all of his improvements stick.

headline.seo: What Happens After ‘Restaurant: Impossible’ Leaves Town
headline.main: After the Cameras Leave the Kitchen
headline.print_headline: After the Cameras Leave the Kitchen
